scripts.migrate-db: npm run build && NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=dist node dist/migrations/index.js
scripts.build-deposit-processor: npm run swagger-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/deposit-processor/tsoa.json && npm run routes-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/deposit-processor/tsoa.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-deposit-processor && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --skipLibCheck
scripts.build-image-deposit-processor: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-deposit-processor:$TRAVIS_COMMIT -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-deposit-processor:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/deposit-processor/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-eth-block-follower: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-ethereum-block-follower:$TRAVIS_COMMIT -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-ethereum-block-follower:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/eth-block-follower/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-kvt-block-follower: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kvt-block-follower:$TRAVIS_COMMIT -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-kvt-block-follower:latest -f packages/services/deposit/src/service-wrappers/kvt-block-follower/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/deposit
scripts.build-image-latest: npm run build-base-image && npm run build-image-deposit-processor && npm run build-image-eth-block-follower && npm run build-image-kvt-block-follower
scripts.push-image: npm run push-deposit-processor-image && npm run push-eth-block-follower-image && npm run push-kvt-block-follower-image
